# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Security Cadet
The Security Cadet is a trainee Security Officer. They are expected to learn the ropes of the job, and eventually take on the role of a Security Officer.
## Do - Learn the job. - Listen to your superiors. - Make yourself aware of Space Law. - Lead by example.
## Don't - Act outside of the Alert Level (e.g. performing random searches while the station is Green). - Use lethal force to arrest criminals unless the situation requires it.
